name: Main St
description: A stretch of Main Street, where the mundane hints at hidden depths. You are on Main St. A manhole cover is securely in place, and the faint sound of running water can be heard, a constant reminder of the modern infrastructure that keeps things running smoothly. The street continues to the east and west, a ribbon of charming commerce. The air is filled with the scent of progress and the faint, sweet smell of possibility.
